DOC.brief_summary: Canadian physicians to experience in real life clinical practice the efficacy and tolerability of adding sitagliptin to their patients who have their glycemic levels inadequately controlled while on metformin
DOC.brief_title: ALPHA Sitagliptin Add on to Metformin (0431-103)
DOC.criteria: Patient Is Currently On Monotherapy With Metformin For At Least 10 Weeks Prior To Study Entry
